sentences.english: He throws the letter into the postbox carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他把信小心的投入了郵箱。

sentences.english: No e-mail newsletters clutter your mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 沒有塞滿您郵箱的電子郵件時事通訊。

sentences.english: Drop the letter into the mailbox marked "Out of Town".
sentences.chinese: 將信投到那個標有“外埠”的郵箱裏。

sentences.english: Have you got an email address?
But Netease still cannot anticipate in the base oneself upon of enterprise mailbox market and development.
sentences.chinese: 但網易在企業郵箱市場的立足與發展仍然不可預期。

sentences.english: Drop it in the mail box marked"Out of town"at that corner.
sentences.chinese: 把它投進那個角落裏標有“外埠”的郵箱。

sentences.english: How to apply for a free mailbox ?
sentences.chinese: 如何申請一個免費的電子郵箱？

sentences.english: You can turn any email address into a Google account.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用任何電子郵箱地址來註冊。

sentences.english: You can, however, mitigate the annoyance and damage done to your inbox.
sentences.chinese: 不過你可以緩解這種麻煩事減少對你郵箱的破壞。

sentences.english: The Keyless Locking Mailbox turns the tables on mail thieves.
sentences.chinese: 不帶鑰匙的郵箱鎖改善了郵件失竊的情況。

sentences.english: A tiger's scratch marks on a tree are like a name on a mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 老虎留在樹上的抓痕就像郵箱上的名字一樣。

sentences.english: Q 3. I’ve heard that you’ve got your own mailbox.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說您有自己的郵箱。

sentences.english: It announced an email address for users to send reports of possible falsehoods.
sentences.chinese: 新浪還專設了舉報郵箱，供用戶舉報疑似虛假消息。

sentences.english: Purchase an international phone card and open an accessible email account.
sentences.chinese: 買一張國際長途電話卡，申請一個穩定的郵箱。

sentences.english: Password All 3 levels temporary password will be sent to your primary email account.
sentences.chinese: 全部3層的密碼會發送到您的電子郵箱。

definition: to transmit/to dispatch/to issue (an official document or credential)
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
email/abbr. for 電子郵件|电子邮件[dian4 zi3 you2 jian4]
